title: 5326 S. Harper in Hyde Park: 2Bed-Heat,New Kitch,SS Appl,DW,MW,HDWD
posting_body: Two Bedroom-One Bath at 5326 S. Harper with stainless steel appliances, granite tops, dishwasher, built-in microwave, brand new aluminum windows, hardwood floors and Sunroom.
Closet space is plentiful and includes some built in shelving.
A coinless laundry room is on site, which you do not have to go outside to access, and there is a rear yard for relaxing outside.
WIFI, heat, water and cooking gas are all FREE!
Finally, there is a nice, well lit and newly painted bike room for your convenience.
5326 S. Harper might just be the best location in Hyde Park.
The University of Chicago is only a few blocks away as are the lakefront, public tennis courts, and Museum of Science and Industry.
Additionally, you are just 1/2 block south of Hyde Park's newly redeveloped 53rd St. retail corridor (including Harper Court), and 2 1/2 blocks to the new Whole Foods!
Metra rail service is provided is within 1 1/2 blocks making access to the Loop and Millennium Park easy and affordable.
The Walk Score at this address is 92 (a "walker's paradise"), and the Bike Score a near perfect 96 (a "biker's paradise")!
Call Eric at 773-593-1147  to schedule a viewing.
For information on similar properties, please visit our website at www.aptrentals.com
$75 Application fee per applicant and co-signer if required
